messages.subject: bringing friend to conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. I m from the Atlanta area as well and am so glad to see someone else from round here.   I don t know anyone locally who is unschooling. Madeline, there
messages.messageBody:
"Hi. I'm from the Atlanta area as well and am so glad to see someone else from
round here. I don't know anyone locally who is unschooling."

Madeline,
there are several unschoolers in Atlanta...one invited us to stay with them last year. There is an inclusive group up there that has unschoolers, can't remember the name. I bet you could find them at the homeschool registry or by checking in at the unschooling.com message board.

Ren
